main.name: Gian Carlo Gutierrez
main.description: I eat, sleep, build and develop
main.bio: Passionate full stack developer driven by creating user-friendly and impactful web applications. With over 3 years of experience, I leverage my diverse programming skillset to craft scalable solutions that solve real-world problems. I thrive on building applications that not only look good but actively improve people's lives.  Currently focused on utilizing React to build modern web experiences.

education.description: Major in Computer Systems Engineering, Athletic Scholarship (Taekwondo)

education.degree: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics Program
education.description: Br. Rolando Dizon FSC Athletic Scholarship (Taekwondo)

work.title: Technical Lead Manager
work.description: Lead a team of developers to develop and maintain web applications using React, NextJS, and Engaging Networks. Collaborated with clients to develop and implement new features. Managed high-profile clients.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Designed and developed scalable web applications using a hybrid approach (Wix, Webflow, Wordpress for rapid prototyping and Django-React/NextJS for complex features). Boosted client lead generation by 40% through a 40% reduction in page load times. Managed high-profile clients.

work.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Full Stack Developer
work.description: Led a research project on an AI-powered system for road physical feature detection. Developed a Flask website with MongoDB for data management and Google Drive for backup.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Contributed to financial technology product development, focusing on automation and backend systems. Collaborated with engineers to deliver high-quality code. Participated in agile development practices.

testimonials.text: Gian is a fantastic teammate! His problem-solving skills are top-notch, and he always finds a way to deliver solutions that are both efficient and user-friendly. He's a great asset to the team.

I've had the pleasure of working with Gian on several projects, and his dedication to building real-world applications that make a difference is truly inspiring. He's a highly skilled developer who's always willing to go the extra mile to help others. A true team player!
